name: Floating Cart Product For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Floating Cart Product For Woocommerce is work when add to cart product than open cart in side.

FEATURES FOR FLOATING CART PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy Setup
  • Show Cart Basket all Page
  • View Cart loop and Display Quantity Box
  • Enable/Disable Coupon Field on mobile
  • Enable Cart Basket
  • View Cart, Checkout, Continue Shopping Button need to be customize
  • Enable/ Disable Trigger to class open cart
  • Remove Product From Cart Option
  • Header Cart, Header Close icon Customize with Color and Hide/show
  • Delete Icon Customize with Color
  • Free Shipping Notification Customize with Color and Hide/show
  • Apply Coupon sticker Customize with Color
  • Customize Coupon, Product Slider And Button Title
  • Mobile Friendly
  • Counting Number of Product in Woocommerce
  • Cart Heading Font size, Font color, Product title size customize of Side Cart For Woocommerce
  • Enable/ Disable in mobile device
  • Customize Cart, Checkout, Shopping Link
  • Increase/Decrease Product Quantity Inside Popup.
  • Basket Counter Position and Color
  • Side Cart Position Left – Right
  • Qty Input box in Side cart
  • Basket Count Type By Number Of Product or Quantity Of All Product
  • Enable/ Disable Cart Icon
  • Footer Button Setting With Button Background, Text Color, Button Margin and Button Row Style
  • WPML Support

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Get Pro | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Support

FEATURES FOR FLOATING CART PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Enable/ Disable Product Slider on Desktop And Mobile View
  • View Shipping, Discount, Tax And All Cart Product Total
  • Cart Product Slider On Desktop/Mobile
  • Enable/ Disable Cart Icon
  • If Cart is Empty Then Cart Basket Hide
  • Hide Cart Icon on Cart/Checkout page
  • Hide Cart Basket on particular page By Page Id

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Floating Cart Product For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Floating Cart Product For Woocommerce

Customer can be show product which added cart in side cart there customer can be remove that product quickly in Woocommerce Slide Out Cart.
